sentence:
Mr. FALLON. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize Pastor lsiah  Moore, Jr., of Celina, Texas, and present him with the Congressional  Patriot Award. Pastor Moore has dedicated himself to faithfully serving  our community and country.

Born in Shreveport, Louisiana, Pastor Moore attended Booker T.  Washington High School…

Mr. FALLON. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize and celebrate Mr.  Steve Ledwell of Texarkana, Texas, and to present him with the  Congressional Patriot Award. Steve has dedicated his life to faithfully  serving his community and country.
